summary:
Replaces the original world map with a 3D paper-like one.
Enhanced version + optional all roads.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#4169E1][b]Support on this mod is permanently closed.[/color][/size]
[size=3][color=#FF8C00]See the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25501]Warburg\'s 3D Paper World Map[/url] for further updates on the paper map and compatibility with the latest Skyrim release.[/color][/size]
[size=4][color=#4169E1]Have fun and thanks for supporting this mod![/b][/color][/size]

===============================================
PaperMapHeight Enhanced by [b]MoonD[/b]
Original texture/mesh and concept by [b]nushu[/b]
[i]Also thanks to the [b]SkyUI team[/b] for the [b]Unofficial UI SDK[/b][/i]
===============================================

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/22425-1-1345744130.jpg[/img]

Uninstall (manual)
===========================================
1. Delete [b]/data/PaperMapHeightEnhanced.esp[/b] & [b]/data/PaperMapHeightEnhanced.ini[/b].
2. Delete both [b]/data/textures/PaperMapHeightEnhanced[/b] & [b]/data/meshes/PaperMapHeightEnhanced[/b] folders.
3. Delete [b]/data/interface/map.swf[/b]

[color=#4169E1][b]IF YOU had installed \"working custom marker\"[/color][/b] [color=#FF8C00](for advanced modders only)[/color]
==============================================================
1. Delete all the files (meshes/terrain/tamriel/tamriel.32.x.x files).
2. Edit your SkyrimPrefs.ini: search for \"[color=#4169E1][b][TerrainManager][/b][/color]\" section and edit this line: [color=#4169E1][b]fSplitDistanceMult=1.5000[/b][/color] then save (it might crash if you load an exterior save that used a higher [color=#4169E1][b]fSplitDistanceMult[/b][/color] setting, just try to load an interior save instead).
author: MoonD
